LanguageData.Jaffa_Armor.label: Jaffa Armor
LanguageData.Jaffa_Armor.description: Powerful Jaffa armor used by the warriors of every Goa'uld.
LanguageData.Jaffa_Helmet.label: Jaffa Helmet
LanguageData.Jaffa_Helmet.description: This basic Jaffa helmet doesn't offer a great protection but this helmet is light.
LanguageData.Jaffa_HorusHelmet.label: Horus Guard Helmet
LanguageData.Jaffa_HorusHelmet.description: This helmet is worn by the Horus Guards lead by the Goa'uld Ra.
LanguageData.Jaffa_JackalHelmet.label: Jackal Guard Helmet
LanguageData.Jaffa_JackalHelmet.description: This Jackal-shaped helmet is worn by the Jackal Guards lead by the Goa'uld Anubis.
LanguageData.Jaffa_SnakeHelmet.label: Serpent Guard Helmet
LanguageData.Jaffa_SnakeHelmet.description: This Snake-shaped helmet is worn by the Serpent Guards lead by the Goa'uld Apophis.
LanguageData.Bullet_JaffaStaff.label: staff shot
LanguageData.Gun_JaffaStaff_blue.label: Ma'Tok Staff
LanguageData.Gun_JaffaStaff_blue.description: The Ma'Tok staff is the primary weapon of Jaffa warriors.
LanguageData.Gun_JaffaStaff_blue.tools.0.label: haft
LanguageData.Gun_JaffaStaff_blue.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Gun_JaffaStaff_violet.label: Ma'Tok Staff
LanguageData.Gun_JaffaStaff_violet.description: The Ma'Tok staff is the primary weapon of Jaffa warriors.
LanguageData.Gun_JaffaStaff_violet.tools.0.label: haft
LanguageData.Gun_JaffaStaff_violet.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Bullet_Zat.label: zat'nik'tel shot
LanguageData.Gun_Zat.label: Zat'nik'tel
LanguageData.Gun_Zat.description: This is a Goa'uld Zat'nik'tel. A weapon using a different form of energy, less powerful than that of a staff weapon. Less destructive, but still quite deadly. One shot can incapacitate a victim.
LanguageData.Gun_Zat.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_Zat.tools.1.label: barrel
